channel.title: THE FRONTLINE PODCAST
channel.description: This Podcast focuses on spreading the bold truth of Jesus Christ by bringing Music Videos and Podcast Messages with strong words of truth. Also, this Podcast is focused on making Christians think about their everyday walk and if they are truly reflecting the light of Jesus or if they are being fake. Are you ready to step into The Frontline? ----------- Este podcast se enfoca en traer videos musicales y podcasts Cristianos con fuertas mensajes que impacten tu vida. Esta es La Linea Frontal, conectando la verdad de Dios con tu vida!
channel.itunes:subtitle: Step Inside Or Step Aside! (Ahora en Esp.)
channel.itunes:author: The Frontline Podcast

item.title: Doctrines of Grace: Perseverance of the Saints (Part 5 of 5)
item.description:
Today I will be launching the fifth message in the "Docrines of Grace" series. The Doctrine we will be reflecting on in this episode is the doctrine of the perseverance of the saints. This study will be administered John Jordan from Providence Church in Garland, Texas. Download the Notes Here
Providence Church Website

item.title: Doctrines of Grace: Limited Atonement (Part 3 of 5)
item.description:
Today I will be launching the third message in the "Docrines of Grace" series. The Doctrine we will be reflecting on in this episode is the doctrine of limited atonement. This study will be administered M. Jay Bennett from Providence Church in Garland, Texas. Download the Notes Here

item.description:

item.title: Doctrines of Grace: Total Depravity (Part 1 of 5)
item.description:
Today I will be launching the "Docrines of Grace" series, also known as the "Five Points of Calvinism". The Doctrine we will be reflecting on in this episode is the doctrine of total depravity. This study will be administered by George Deines from Providence Church in Garland, Texas. Providence Church Website
Download the Notes Here

item.title: Five Solas of the Reformation: Soli Deo Gloria (Part 5 of 5)
item.description: We come to the last of "the Five Solas of the Reformation". Today we will be studying our belief in "Soli Deo Gloria" which is Latin for "Glory to God alone". This sums up the series and will launch the "Doctrines of Grace" teaching series next week. This study will be administered by Rev. Eric Hartman from Providence Church in Garland, TX. Providence Church Website
item.dc:creator: The Frontline Podcast
item.itunes:summary:
We come to the last of "the Five Solas of the Reformation". Today we will be studying our belief in "Soli Deo Gloria" which is Latin for "Glory to God alone". This sums up the series and will launch the "Doctrines of Grace" teaching series next week. This study will be administered by Rev. Eric Hartman from Providence Church in Garland, TX.
Providence Church Website

item.title: Five Solas of the Reformation: Solus Christus (Part 4 of 5)
item.description: In this episode of the "Five Solas of the Reformation" series we will be exploring our core belief in "Solus Christus" which is Latin for "Christ Alone". As Christians we hold the belief that Jesus is the only way to our heavenly Father, there is absolutely no other way beside Him. This study will be administered by Rev. Eric Hartman from Providence Church in Garland, TX. Providence Church Website
item.dc:creator: The Frontline Podcast
item.itunes:summary:

item.title: Five Solas of the Reformation: Sola Fide (Part 3 of 5)
item.description: Today I launch the third message of the "Five Solas of the Reformation" teaching series. Sola fide is latin for "by faith alone" and we will be exploring this fundamental belief today. This study will be administered by Rev. Eric Hartman from Providence Church in Garland, TX. Providence Church Website
item.dc:creator: The Frontline Podcast
item.itunes:summary:
Today I launch the third message of the "Five Solas of the Reformation" teaching series. Sola fide is latin for "by faith alone" and we will be exploring this fundamental belief today. This study will be administered by Rev. Eric Hartman from Providence Church in Garland, TX.
Providence Church Website

item.title: Five Solas of the Reformation: Sola Gratia (Part 2 of 5)
item.description: Today I launch the second message of the "Five Solas of the Reformation" teaching series. Sola Gratia is latin for "by Grace Alone" and this is what we will be exploring in the current Episode. God's amazing grace could be defined as the "sovereign favor of God" and for this we should glorify and adore our great Lord and Savior. So listen in and let's learn together why this belief is fundamental and of great importance for every single one of God's Children. This study will be administered by Rev. Eric Hartman from Providence Church in Garland, TX. Providence Church Website
item.dc:creator: The Frontline Podcast
item.itunes:summary:

So listen in and let's learn together why this belief is fundamental and of great importance for every single one of God's Children. This study will be administered by Rev. Providence Church Website

item.title: Five Solas of the Reformation: Sola Scriptura (Part 1 of 5)
item.description: Today I launch the "Five Solas of the Reformation" teaching series. This study consists of the five core beliefs of the Christian church as they were drawn out back in the sixteenth century Protestant Reformation. In this podcast we will be exploring our core belief of "Sola Sriptura" which is Latin for "by Scripture Alone". We as Christians know or should know that the Holy Bible was God Breathed and and is the complete revelation of God to us, as such it should be regarded as the primary source of Truth about God and His relation to us. This study will be administered by Rev. Eric Hartman from Providence Church in Garland, TX. Providence Church Website
item.dc:creator: The Frontline Podcast
